content: आयत {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Long; दशांगुलमायता यष्टिः a stick ten fingers long; शतमध्यर्धं (योजनं) आयता <ls>Mb.</ls>; °स्वभावानि च दुःखानि <ls>K. 175</ls> lasting. {@--2@} Diffuse, prolix. {@--3@} Big, large, great; <ls>Pt. 1.</ls> {@--4@} Drawn, attracted. {@--5@} Longdrawn, distant. {@--6@} Curbed, restrained. --तः An oblong (in geometry). --तं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} Deeply, long; as in आयतं निश्वस्य.
